fields.q_text: Which of these compliments from a student would make him happiest?
fields.ans_a: I appreciate how hard you work preparing materials for our class.
fields.ans_c: You are a very good, professional teacher.
fields.discussion: What kinds of compliments make you happiest? Is there any compliment that you get that doesn't make you particularly happy?

fields.q_text: Which of these words would he not use to describe himself?
fields.discussion: Do you think any of these words describe you?

fields.q_text: Which of these Taiwanese snacks does he refuse to eat?
fields.discussion: Which of these is your favorite and least favorite? What is your favorite Taiwanese snack of all? What snacks from other cuisines do you especially enjoy?

fields.q_text: Which of these statements is true?
fields.discussion: Which of these is your favorite and least favorite? What is your favorite Taiwanese snack of all? What snacks from other cuisines do you especially enjoy?
